headline: Tech Mahindra Licenses AT&T's Network Test and Automation Platform to Enhance Global CSP Network Reliability
summary: Tech Mahindra (NSE: TECHM), a leading global provider of technology consulting and digital solutions to enterprises across industries, today announced a licensing agreement with AT&T for its proprietary Automated Network Testing (ANT) and Open Tool platforms. These applications deliver an advanced platform designed to transform network testing and certification across Long Term Evolution (LTE), 5G Non-Standalone (NSA), and 5G Standalone (SA) domains.
